item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 艾伦·凯：预测未来（Predicting The Future） in the user temberature at 2022-05-19T05:35:39
item.description:
in reference to:

在一些数学和科学课程中，他们经常告诉你，最好的方法是改变问题。我认为最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景。几年前，马文·明斯基说，“你只有通过多种方式才能理解一件事。”（You don’t understand something until you understand it more than one way.）

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 阅读的未来取决于学习难学东西的未来（艾伦·凯） in the user temberature at 2022-05-19T06:06:24
item.description:
in reference to:

印刷的真正意义不是模仿手写的圣经，而是150年后以新的方式讨论科学和政治治理。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 4.6. 暂退法（Dropout） — 动手学深度学习 2.0.0-beta0 documentation in the user temberature at 2022-05-26T05:59:23
item.description:
in reference to:

需要说明的是，暂退法的原始论文提到了一个关于有性繁殖的类比： 神经网络过拟合与每一层都依赖于前一层激活值相关，称这种情况为“共适应性”。 作者认为，暂退法会破坏共适应性，就像有性生殖会破坏共适应的基因一样。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 加粗几个字母之后，英语阅读速度原地起飞，真的这么神奇吗？ in the user temberature at 2022-06-02T07:14:02
item.description:
in reference to:

这也解释了仿生阅读为什么妨碍了习惯扫读的读者。对于这些人来说，可能整体高亮关键词、或者高亮句首、段首会更有用。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 加粗几个字母之后，英语阅读速度原地起飞，真的这么神奇吗？ in the user temberature at 2022-06-02T07:15:27
item.description:
in reference to:

从这个角度来讲，仿生阅读也未必适用于所有文章。沈阳师范大学曾做过一项文本标注对中文阅读眼动的研究。研究显示，虽然添加高亮会指引和帮助参与者们更好地记忆重点内容、忽略干扰内容，但如果含有错误标识或标识过多，那与无标识的阅读效率几乎是一样的。同时，如果阅读的文本是比较简单的内容，那标示也未必可以提高正确率。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 加粗几个字母之后，英语阅读速度原地起飞，真的这么神奇吗？ in the user temberature at 2022-06-02T07:16:51
item.description:
in reference to:

加粗分词后的第一个字确实有助于帮助断句、加快阅读。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:05:35
item.description:
in reference to:

记忆：重复回忆问题；时间间隔随着回答成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 过程的流畅性：重复完成简短练习，有许多变体；时间间隔随着成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 卡片写作：重复问题、模糊的想法、主干想法，从中积累思考，时间跨度为几个月；将卡片标记为「有成果」或「无成果」，以扩大/缩小时间间隔 习惯养成：重复简短的反思卡片，可能根据顺序改变，应用于你的日常经验；间隔默认扩大，但可以放缓 阅读队列：一系列 PDF，标签页，书本，总在变换：如果一段时间内忽略某些内容，它就会暂离一周，之后是一个月；比如说「我现在读够什么了」，这东西就会几天之内再次呈现；说某个东西「不是现在读」，那就几个月，之后是几个月之后再呈现…… 电子邮件收件箱、任务队列、个人通信等

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:06:25
item.description:
in reference to:

总体而言，这个系统意在让你能把想法送入你的轨道（Orbit）。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 专家解读存款保险条例征求意见银行破产最高赔付50万_要闻_新闻_中国政府网 in the user temberature at 2022-06-28T06:59:28
item.description:
in reference to:

在没有存款保险制度时，老百姓觉得银行“越大越保险”，存款向大银行聚集，中小银行生存空间很小。有了存款保险，存款放在小银行和大银行一样安全，这也为银行业的发展创造一个更加公平竞争的环境。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:
in reference to:

广大的投资者存款户如果有50万以上的金额，不会做简单的存款，一定是会购买银行其他的理财产品，而且会以金融合约方式，和银行谈长期的存款和投资协议，那已经不属于存款这个范围之内。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:22:29
item.description:
in reference to:

some of the reasons have nothing to do with choosing the “best learning tool,” but with regards to how my workflow and my life have changed.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:25:54
item.description:
in reference to:

I focused almost entirely on optimizing when I should review the material. My partner made to realize that any spaced repetition algorithm is only half of the story. The other half is how you engage with the material.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:35:57
item.description:
in reference to:

But here’s the catch: the connection doesn’t happen automatically. You still have to intentionally and consciously think about the big picture to improve your understanding.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:44:26
item.description:
in reference to:

From now on, my focus on “how to learn” would be shifted from “when should I review this” to “what should I do when I indeed review this?” It’ll be about thinking frameworks and mental models; it’s about “what and how to think” instead of “when to think.”

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Folder Structure to Maximize Writing with Devonthink Pro — Workflows in Personal and Professional Productivity in the user temberature at 2022-09-03T14:29:11
item.description:
in reference to:

Although at one point I had all my information on manuscripts in a single DTP database, over the last year I have maintained separate databases; one for PDFs, another for my annotations.I accomplish this by having separate folders in Dropbox. After extracting my annotations from Highlights.app, I place the exported files in their own folder. Once a month, I export all the PDFs in my Paper’s Library to their own Dropbox folder. I use a Hazel script to throw away any duplicate PDFs in the Dropbox folder. I index (not import) the annotations folder into one DTP database, and index my PDFs into another.

item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:20:58
item.description:
in reference to:

每日总热量的 50%～55% 左右应由碳水化合物构成，其中大部分来自水果、蔬菜、豆类和豆科植物以及粗粮。添加糖在每日总热量中的占比应小于 10%。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:25:14
item.description:
in reference to:

人体对鸡蛋中蛋白质的利用率为 100%，牛奶和肉类蛋白质利用率也同样很高。人体对大多数蔬菜和谷物中的蛋白质的利用率略低于 50%。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:27:38
item.description:
in reference to:

蛋白质通常不用于供应能量。然而，如果人体未从其他营养物质或体内贮存的脂肪中获得足够热量，则会将蛋白质分解为酮体以供应能量。如果蛋白质的消耗量比需要量多，那么人体就会分解蛋白质，然后以脂肪的形式贮存起来。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:36:29
item.description:
in reference to:

脂肪是供应能量最慢的物质，但却是食物中能量效率最高的。每克脂肪能够供应机体大约 9 卡路里的能量，比蛋白质或者碳水化合物的两倍还多。

item.description:

所以我认为碧然德滤水壶的主要作用是软化水质。而水质软化之后能提升口感，避免产生水垢等作用。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How To Take Smart Notes –– Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:00:56
item.description:
in reference to:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How to Take Smart Notes by Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:07:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Don’t simply copy your notes into a rough draft, but translate them into something coherent and embed them into the context of your argument. As you detect any holes in your argument, fill them in, or change your argument.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated (91 封私信 / 80 条消息) 石墨烯电暖产品是真的还是假的？ - 知乎 in the user temberature at 2022-11-11T17:12:14
item.description:
in reference to:

石墨烯地暖目前最大的问题在「涂层」，如果不去做好「封装」，长时间会氧化、粉化及脱落，不可能做到耐用 20 万小时。加上采用丝印工艺，两端涂布不均匀，容易产生「电阻差」，功率不到几年就衰退了，结果就是更耗电而你不自知！

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Git - Git Configuration in the user temberature at 2022-11-15T04:43:42
item.description:
in reference to:

Git can handle this by auto-converting CRLF line endings into LF when you add a file to the index, and vice versa when it checks out code onto your filesystem. You can turn on this functionality with the core.autocrlf setting. If you’re on a Windows machine, set it to true — this converts LF endings into CRLF when you check out code: $ git config --global core.autocrlf true

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Git - Git Configuration in the user temberature at 2022-11-15T04:45:39
item.description:
in reference to:

You can tell Git to convert CRLF to LF on commit but not the other way around by setting core.autocrlf to input:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 英语学习型词典 vs 母语型词典 in the user temberature at 2022-11-20T05:45:54
item.description:
in reference to:

从获取词义的效率上讲，英汉词典远高于英英词典。缺乏足够的生活积累，没有图片对比参照的前提下，要想真正理解一个生词，不管是抽象的，还是具象的，都是很困难的。有了汉语释义的提示，再去读英语释义，就相当于考试事先看了答案或者带了小抄儿，再去考试，就心中有底了。
